* [Home](https://www.weslacotx.gov/)
* [Departments](https://www.weslacotx.gov/departments/index.php)
* Information Technology

**MISSION STATEMENT  
  
The Information Technology Department provides city departments with technology solutions and support. The Department strives to provide timely support, and stable technology systems to address the needs of various city departments; so they can in turn provide the City of Weslaco residents with the utmost customer service.  
  
  
Information Technology Functions**  
The Information Technology Department performs a variety of functions (IT Disciplines / Competencies) that range from installing applications to designing complex networks and information databases. The duties of the IT staff include data management, technical documentation of all processes and procedures, networking, computer hardware/software, telephony, database, web, graphics and design, maintenance of City Social Media Sites as well as management and administration of systems.  
  
  
The Information Technology Department provides support to :  
  

* City Hall
* City Library
* Airport
* City Secretary
* Finance
* Human Resources
* City Manager's Office
* Four Fire Stations
* Municipal Court
* Police
* Planning
* Code Enforcement
* Engineering
* Public Works
* Public Utilities
* Parks & Recreation
* EMS
